item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

10. Embeddings Are Underrated (75 points | 36 comments)

13. Pythagora (GPT Pilot) (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)

22. Sets, types and type checking (78 points | 12 comments)
23. A conserved fertilization complex bridges sperm and egg in vertebrates (23 points | 7 comments)
24. Tell HN: Robots.txt pitfalls – what I learned the hard way (112 points | 33 comments)
25. Wait Until 8th (392 points | 276 comments)
26. Crux, a Precise Verifier for Rust and Other Languages (72 points | 4 comments)
27. Lectron System, the Arduino Precursor (14 points | 6 comments)

29. What sank the Bayesian superyacht in Italy? (120 points | 157 comments)
30. Antibody Drug Conjugates: A frontier in cancer treatment (73 points | 23 comments)
